comment._content:
This picture always reminds me of a joke I read in the NY Herald Tribune years ago.

Q: How can you tell if George Washington was in the army or navy?
A: He stood up in a boat so he had to be in the army!

comment.author: 14343849@N05
comment._content: I just read an article that recreates this more accurately, saying that they wouldn't have used a boat, but a raft tied to cables, due to the transport of animals and cannons. It was also very foggy and George would have been sitting.
